content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Elle permet de découvrir la fonction min de python

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Fast and easy clash, good for speed

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: C'est clair et précis et il maîtrise son sujet !!!
I believe that if you reduce the number of repetitions of the word "virtual" in the description and be more direct in the information, it would make the challenge more readable.

All sections
* Please do not use the same letters (in uppercase and lowercase) as variable names. The stub generator does not generate a proper default code and treats them as the same variable names for some languages, e.g. Ruby.

Cases
* Suggest to add a pair of test and validator where the ingredients available are insufficient to bake any cake, i.e. the answer is 0.

Thanks.

Thank you for your valuable feedback. I understand your points and I agree that these changes will make the problem more comprehensible and versatile.

I will revise the problem as per your suggestions:

- Replace the variable names to avoid confusion between uppercase and lowercase letters.
- Add a new test and validator pair where the available ingredients are insufficient to bake any cake.

I appreciate your time and constructive comments to improve the quality of my problem.

Thank you for your constructive feedback on the problem statement. I agree that the repeated use of the word "virtual" can make the text less concise and potentially confusing. I will revise the statement to make it more direct and readable.

I appreciate your attention to detail and the time you took to review and suggest improvements for the problem.
Merici. La simplicité fait la beauté!
